title: Government of India donates new facilities to upgrade two vocational training centres in Batticaloa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Minister of Youth Affairs and Skills Development, Dullas Alahapperuma and the High Commissioner of India, Ashok K. Kantha signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for setting up facilities at two vocational training centres in Batticaloa District, eastern province in Sri Lanka.  The signing ceremony was held today at 11.45…
